title: Aleutian World War II National Historic Area: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps          Wind and waves - the forces of nature dominate the Aleutian Islands. This chain of islands is vast, stretching 1,200 miles (1,900 kilometers) across the North Pacific. Maps are crucial to not only planning a visit to this far-off place, but also to understanding how geography shaped the stories of this campaign in World War II.            Click on the map above to view a larger version
